articles.author: Jason Ma
articles.title: This is America’s ‘fatal flaw’ as the US bubble gets ready to pop, market expert warns - Fortune
articles.description: "All the classic signs of extreme prices, valuations and sentiment suggest the end is near."

articles.author: Simar Bajaj
articles.title: Heart disease deaths soar in rural America, driven by rise in working-age adults - NBC News
articles.description: Heart disease death rates in rural America are rising among younger people, increasing the rural-urban divide, according to research in the Journal of the American College of Cardiology.
articles.content:
When Ephraim Trembly found his brother in rural Maryland, John had already been dead for three days. 
According to their father, John Trembly Sr., how he died remained unclear, since Johns body was … [+9960 chars]
